text: To examine the viral load of EV71 in the tissues of mice while treated with N3 , we isolated RNA from the different organs from 5746 - infected mice on Day 6 post infection and then quantified EV71 transcripts using real - time RT - PCR . We noticed that administration of N3 reduced viral expression significantly in the brain , spinal cord , muscle , skin , and the intestine ( Fig . 6 ) . We also confirmed that CNS - and limb muscle - tropism of EV71 viremia occurred in this model [ 11 ] .
